SENT.plain: GLP-1 analogues (incretin mimetics) and DPP-4 inhibitors (incretin enhancers) represent new classes of anti-diabetic agents for the treatment of type 2 diabetes
The efficacy and safety of the incretin mimetic exenatide and of the DPP-4 inhibitors, sitagliptin and vildagliptin, have been clearly demonstrated by a very large number of clinical trials
Efficacy was demonstrated in terms of reduction of HbA1c, fasting and postprandial glucose
Moreover, exenatide showed a favourable effect on weight, while DPP-4 inhibitors were neutral with respect to this outcome
The low rate of hypoglycemic events seen in all studies confirms the glucose dependent action of incretins
